entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:42 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 8:42 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
